data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tan, Ming Kai, Dawwrueng, Pattarawich, Artchawakom, Taksin (2015): A new species of Velarifictorus (Pseudocoiblemmus) from Thailand (Gryllidae, Gryllinae, Modicogryllini) with key to species. Zootaxa 3981 (1): 138-142, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3981.1.8
